reviews.review:
At 1000 hours, you obviously can use these time to read some books, go to the gym to keep fit, go to the movies with the girls you like, even if you go out and get drunk with your buddies.
But you chose to play CSGO at home, focus on shooting at each other with 9 other gay guys on the same map, sometimes giggling at the screen, and sometimes focused and nervous, but you never regretted the 1000-plus hours.
In this rubbish game environment full of cheaters and pretending to be persecutors, bad games make you think "I'm a Fxxking dog when I play this game again." However, every time you finish your day's work, turn on your computer, log in to STEAM, and watch the PM sent to you by several comrades who accompany you every day, you will be excited again!
You have to admit, you love this game, it has become a part of your life.

This game is for cheaters only! If you play this game without cheats, then you are a fag! (the exception is only if you play on your main account). This is issue game. If you play in this game - please delete this game!
Pretty good, has a $2.50/pull slot machine to boot...
